Over the past month or so, I have been making the gradual switch from Sublime Text 2 to vim after reading about its supposed increase in efficency. Although I had been warned of vim’s steep learning curve, I actually found the transition to be rather smooth, and now feeling about as comfortable as I did with ST2.
